description:
Provides a TencentCloud Container Cluster Instance resource.

~> **NOTE:** It has been deprecated and replaced by  tencentcloud_kubernetes_scale_worker.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Bandwidth.description: The network bandwidth of the node.

BandwidthType.description: The network type of the node.

Cpu.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.16.0. Set 'instance_type' instead. The cpu of the node.

CvmType.description: The type of node needed by cvm.

DockerGraphPath.description: The docker graph path is going to mounted.

InstanceType.description: The instance type of the node needed by cvm.

IsVpcGateway.description: Describe whether the node enable the gateway capability.

KeyId.description: The key_id of each node(if using key pair to access).

Mem.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.16.0. Set 'instance_type' instead. The memory of the node.

MountTarget.description: The path which volume is going to be mounted.

Period.description: The puchase duration of the node needed by cvm.

RequireWanIp.description: Indicate whether wan ip is needed.

RootSize.description: The size of the root volume.

RootType.description: The type of the root volume. see more from CVM.

StorageSize.description: The size of the data volume.

StorageType.description: The type of the data volume. see more from CVM.

SubnetId.description: The subnet id which the node stays in.

Unschedulable.description: Determine whether the node will be schedulable. 0 is the default meaning node will be schedulable. 1 for unschedulable.

UserScript.description: User defined script in a base64-format. The script runs after the kubernetes component is ready on node. see more from CCS api documents.

ZoneId.description: The zone which the node stays in.
